keyMoments.description: Bartholomew Kuma, one of the Seven Warlords, appears at Thriller Bark seeking Gecko Moria (another Warlord).
keyMoments.significance: Shows interaction between two Warlords and hints at the complex relationships within this organization.

description: Seven powerful pirates who work for the World Government. They are allowed to plunder other pirates in exchange for a portion of their loot and cooperation with the government.
goals: Maintain balance of power in the world
Hunt pirates on behalf of the World Government
